title: The Traveller
description: What would be the result in the future of all our technological advancement? What will we see if we ever get there? Does progress ever end? This is the story of two people from different worlds who learn from each other what it means to be human and what the value of that is. It is a spiritual and humorous journey across time and space that brings together philosophy, wisdom and human potential. It challenges us to change the way we think of ourselves.
author: Andrew J.  Weston
